page.title: 07IRVINE * BRITISH TELECOM
page.content:
British Telecom chose Irvine as the site for their{International Directory {Enquiries Bureau.
There are 51 day staff and 50 night staff, and there are 7 people employed in the canteen. The International Directory Enquiries Bureau was opened in July 1983. Everything in the Bureau is controlled by computer, including the incoming calls to Directory Enquiries.The ground floor contains the telephone exchange for the Irvine area. This is a smaller place, employing only 22. It is a TXK 1 Crossbar Exchange with a {capacity of 8000 telephone lines. The exchange has about a dozen vans which carry every kind of tool needed to repair a telephone, the also carry brand new telephones for installation.
